text: Bring the semolina to a boil. Add the sugar and water and cook for five minutes. Pour in the juice. Add the jelly crystals. Remove from heat. Pour into a suitable mould and leave to cool. Whip once cool. Leave the jelly to set.  Serve with ice cream, cream, shredded coconut, or a sprinkling of chopped nuts. Alternatively, make a citrus sauce and drizzle over the pudding, decorating with real orange slices. Finished.
